net.akaish.kitty.orm.util

Class KittySimpleMigrationScriptGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.akaish.kitty.orm.util.KittySimpleMigrationScriptGenerator

  • public class KittySimpleMigrationScriptGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple utility for generating migration script sequence.
    It is capable only to delete and create new indexes and table as well as adding or deleting columns in existing tables, so use it only when you're sure that there are no constraints defined that can be violated with script created by this utility class.
    KSMSG v.1 Created by akaish on 13.10.18.

      java.util.LinkedList<KittySQLiteQuery> generateAlterTableWithRedundantColumns(KittyTableConfiguration conf, KittySimpleMigrationScriptGenerator.DiffElement element)
      Generates query sequence that doing following things:
      Renames current existing table to new name
      Creates new table without redundant columns
      Copies fields same fields from old table to new one
      Wipes old table

      • KittySimpleMigrationScriptGenerator

        public KittySimpleMigrationScriptGenerator(android.content.Context ctx,
                                           KittyDatabaseConfiguration databaseConfiguration,
                                           android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase database)
        At this constructor would be generated diff collection. Also in this constructor would be some database calls, so it is quite slow. Good idea to start transaction for provided database before initializing it.

        public java.util.LinkedList<KittySQLiteQuery> generateAlterTableWithRedundantColumns(KittyTableConfiguration conf,
                                                                                     KittySimpleMigrationScriptGenerator.DiffElement element)
        Generates query sequence that doing following things:
        Renames current existing table to new name
        Creates new table without redundant columns
        Copies fields same fields from old table to new one
        Wipes old table
